com.notification.types

Class BorderLayoutNotification

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.notification.Notification
      • com.notification.types.WindowNotification
        • com.notification.types.BorderLayoutNotification
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CustomNotification, IconNotification, ProgressBarNotification, TextNotification

    public class BorderLayoutNotification
extends WindowNotification
    Lays out Swing Components in a BorderLayout.
